about_the_game: Show your support for NERTS! Online by purchasing the Sponsorship Package, which unlocks a NERTS! Online themed card back and a special holographic foil effect you can use with it or any of the other card backs.
detailed_description: Show your support for NERTS! Online by purchasing the Sponsorship Package, which unlocks a NERTS! Online themed card back and a special holographic foil effect you can use with it or any of the other card backs.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3, 1366 x 768
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3, 3840 x 2160
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1366 x 768
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.9+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3840 x 2160
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: NERTS! Online - Sponsorship Package

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1366 x 768
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3840 x 2160
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
